overview: The middle school bully world in Seoul is divided into Gangnam and Gangbuk, where Ji Hyeon Soo from Namchun is the head of Gangnam, and Han Jeong Pil is the head of Gangbuk. Known as 'the two kings', their fighting skills cannot be matched by other gangsters from other middle schools, and no one dares to challenge them.  Then one day, a goblin comes out of nowhere, and the kings are beaten. Since then, he becomes the best legendary fighter in the gangster world. Time passes and all the middle schoolers, including the top two, move on to high school, and they take over all the schools with their excellent fighting skills, making their way to the top.  Meanwhile, the 'legendary goblin', Kang In Ho, enters Kang Ho High disguising himself as a loser in hopes of living a quiet life, but gets involved with the gangster fight for power, and starts a new war.
title: Bullies Season 2: Goblin
